name: Portalicus
description:
My 7dfps entry. It's just the one "level". Look for monoliths, go through portals. Current build only supports controllers (no keyboard + mouse input). Made in Godot.

Monoliths that you still need to go through a portal to get to are greyed out in the radar.

CONTROLS:

Move: Left Stick
Look: Right Stick
Sprint: L3
Jump: X / A
Fire Grappling Hooks: L2 / R2
Pause: Options / Start / ESC
